item.title: No drain where water pools, 7th December
item.description:
On east side of Evesham Rd at new bicycle path and pedestrian crossing there is NO DRAIN where the water pools. The water pools at the pedestrian crossing. The puddle is deep too deep and wide when filled with water to allow pedestrians to stand or coss at the pedestrian crossing. Pedestrians are forced onto the cycle path. Hundreds of children cross here twice every day. There will very likely be a collision between a cyclist and a pedestrian (probably a small child) of this is not fixed. I have raised this 3 times. It is not a problem with drains not working. Jetting the drains won't, and hasn't, fixed it. This was built wrong. The drains are located on high ground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Evesham Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Some grease/oil or slippery stuff on this manhole cover, 7th December
item.description:
On the pavement to the right hand side when facing front of Regent Arcade multi storey car park, just under sign as in photo. I walked across at 12.15 this afternoon on the way into town, slipped, and went straight down on the ground, knocking my right jaw bone badly and grazing my left thumb through a pair of thick woollen gloves. Several motorists will have witnessed this. I am 65 years old. Luckily, two other pedestrians, a man from South Africa and a lady nurse came to my aid and helped to get me up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parabola Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Overflowing bins and abandoned cage, 7th December
item.description:
These bins are continually overflowing and limiting access to The Minster. The cage has been there for more than three weeks. This is a public right of way and well used as people walk through the churchyard to Clarence Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Rubbish in car park area, 7th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5-7, Promenade, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Huge tree in stream on council land, 7th December
item.description:
The large tree in the stream which backs onto the property of 34 Green Lane and Porchester Road is dangerously big in high winds and branches come out over property of the other houses and have started snapping. This is council property and tree is located in the brook

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Gloucester

item.title: All the drains are blocked from Ellenborough Park Hotel to Laxton Meadow. This means water runs down the hill and creates a massive puddle on the B4632. Now the leaves are down, can we get the road sweeper and drain unblocked out so we are winter ready in the main roads., 7th December
item.description:
All drains on Ellenborough Park Hotel side of the road from Southam to Prestbury. B4632 Southam Road.
